content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) with no power

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using pipe connections
-  Ensure that the pipe connection exists before attempting to use it
-  Make sure the offshore pump and boiler are connected with a pipe

### Errors when using drills
-  Ensure that the drill has enough fuel before attempting to mine

### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel before attempting to use it

### Errors when using labs
-  Ensure that the lab has power before attempting to use it

### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure that the research is valid before attempting to set it

### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure that the entities can be connected before attempting to connect them
-  Ensure that the connection points are valid before attempting to connect entities
